Title: Hot to the Touch
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Writer: Pendleton Ward (created by), Patrick McHale (story by), Kent Osborne (story by), Pendleton Ward (story by), Cole Sanchez, Rebecca Sugar
Actors: Jeremy Shada, John DiMaggio, Jessica DiCicco, Andy Milonakis
Plot: Refusing to believe that she is evil, Finn tries to win over his new crush, Flame Princess.
